activities.name: Explore the Resort Grounds
activities.description: Take a leisurely stroll and discover the hidden gems of our beautiful resort. From serene gardens to stunning viewpoints, there's something for everyone.

activities.name: Invigorating Gym Session
activities.description: Enjoy a workout session at our state-of-the-art gym. Equipped with the latest machines and offering stunning views.

activities.name: Indulgent Spa Day
activities.description: Treat yourself to a relaxing spa day. Choose from a variety of massages, facials, and other rejuvenating treatments.

activities.name: Savor Fine Dining at XYZ Restaurant
activities.description: Experience exquisite flavors at our renowned XYZ Restaurant. Indulge in a culinary journey crafted by our award-winning chefs.

activities.name: Convenient Room Service
activities.description: Enjoy delicious meals and beverages in the comfort of your own room. Our extensive room service menu is available around the clock.

activities.name: Historical City Walking Tour
activities.description: Embark on a guided walking tour through the historic heart of the city. Discover ancient landmarks and learn about the rich cultural heritage.

activities.name: Visit to the National Museum
activities.description: Immerse yourself in art and history with a visit to the National Museum. Explore fascinating exhibits showcasing the region's treasures.

activities.name: Traditional Craft Workshop
activities.description: Participate in a hands-on workshop and learn the art of traditional local crafts. Create your own souvenir to take home.
